semantic: The type palette is a collection of global tokens which are immanent throughout the rest of the application. The palette helps outline the semantic use of type styling in the design system.

h1.semantic: type is reserved for 1st most important thing on a page, such as the page title

h2.semantic: type is reserved for 2nd most important things on the page

h3.semantic: type reserved for 3rd most important things on a page

h4.semantic: type reserved for 4th most important things on a page

h5.semantic: type reserved for 5th most important things on a page

h6.semantic: type reserved for sixth most important thing on a page. type at this size is the same as normal paragraph font so might also be considered for minor emphasis

hyperlink.semantic: type which links to another page

smalltext.semantic: used for captions, or information which is important but not primary in it's specific context
